content: उत्कंठित {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Anxious, uneasy. {@--2@} Regretting, grieving for, sorrowful. {@--3@} Longing for a beloved person or thing. --ता A mistress longing for her absent lover or husband, one of the eight heroines; she is thus defined --आगंतुं कृतचित्तोऽपि दैवान्नायाति यत्प्रियः . तंदनागमदुःखार्ता विरहोत्कंठिता तु सा .. <ls>S. D. 121.</ls>
